嬉皮笑臉.definition: all smiles; smiling mischievously or ingratiatingly

嬉笑.definition: to be laughing and playing; to giggle

嬉笑怒罵.definition: lit. laughs, jeers, anger and invective (idiom); fig. all kinds of emotions; to mock and scold; (of writing) freely roving; following the author's fancy

嬉遊.definition: to amuse oneself; to have fun
